Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_HuoYu
Text.Desc: A peculiar feather, although it is not very hot to the touch, it can keep diffusing heat indefinitely, significantly increasing the temperature of a room or other confined space. It doesn't seem to have much use except for its strong spirit converging effect.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_GangYu
Text.Desc: An intact Phoenix feather, its immense heat entirely confined within. It is sharp and sturdy. Wearing it enables one to become impervious to cold, speeding up the circulation of Qi and blood as well as boosting food consumption rate.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_TouYu
Text.Desc: The gorgeous feather in eternal flames from Phoenix's head, containing its concentrated essence. Phoenix is skilled in the ways of spells. Wearing it allows one to harness the power of Phoenix and break through the skill limit of Spell by 3 levels.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_WeiYu
Text.Desc: Phoenix's huge tail feather. Despite the glowing flame dwelling atop it, one feels moderately warm rather than burning hot upon touching it, which is quite marvelous. It should have some peculiar effects after having been processed with a special method.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_Gu
Text.Desc: The hollow bones of Phoenix's two wings, they are unusually firm and weightless. It should have some peculiar effects after having been processed with a special method.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_HongYu
Text.Desc: Phoenix's source of power; this is where its primordial spirit resides. If one communicate with its primordial spirit, one might be able to comprehend some useful information from it. Wearing it allows one to harness Phoenix's power and take 10% less Fire damage.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Meditate
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Attempt to obtain some useful information from it.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_Meat
Text.Desc: The finest flesh and blood of Phoenix's body, consuming it increase one's Max Qi by 25, and extend Lifespan for 10 years. Multiple consumptions will gradually diminish its effect.

Text.Name: Item_DragonScale
Text.Desc: Scale fallen from dragon's body, it has lost most of its magical qualities except for a strong spirit converging effect.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_Jiao
Text.Desc: The horn on top of Flood Dragon's head, it is where the dragon's essence is concentrated. Flood Dragon is skilled in the ways of Artifact Mastery. Wearing it allows one to harness the power of Flood Dragon and break through the skill limit of Sword Mastery by 3 levels.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_Zhua
Text.Desc: Sharp claw from Flood Dragon, it has no shortage of sharpened edges and possess unstoppable destructive power. It should have some peculiar effects after having been processed with a special method.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_Lin
Text.Desc: An intact scale from the body of Flood Dragon, it is quite indestructible. Wearing it enables one to resist Qi Damage.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_NiLin
Text.Desc: The source of Flood Dragon's power, this is where its primordial spirit resides. If one communicate with its primordial spirit, one might be able to comprehend some useful information from it. Wearing it allows one to harness the power of Flood Dragon, and take 10% less Water damage.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Meditate
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Attempt to obtain some useful information from it.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_Jing
Text.Desc: The toughest tendon-meridian in Flood Dragon's tail, it is of excellent Qi conductivity. It should have some peculiar effects after having been processed with a special method.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_Meat
Text.Desc: The finest flesh and blood of Flood Dragon's body, consuming it increase one's Max Qi by 25, and extend Lifespan for 10 years. Multiple consumptions will gradually diminish its effect.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_BaiLin
Text.Desc: Pure white scale shed from Torch Dragon's body.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_HeiLin
Text.Desc: Pitch black scale shed from Torch Dragon's body.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_Eye
Text.Desc: Transparent crystals of the mixed black and white colors in Torch Dragon's eyes, through which one can seemingly decipher the mysteries of the ways of yin and yang. It should have some peculiar effects after having been processed with a special method.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_TianLin
Text.Desc: The odd shaped scale in between the Torch Dragon's eyebrows, it is where the dragon's essence is concentrated. Five Elements which have been transformed by Torch Dragon from Yin and Yang. Wearing it allows one to harness the power of Torch Dragon and break through the skill limit of Barrier by 3 levels.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_LongYu
Text.Desc: Torch Dragon's source of power, this is where a wisp of its remaining primordial spirit resides. If one communicate with its primordial spirit, one might be able to comprehend some useful information from it. Wearing it allows one to harness the power of Torch Dragon, and take 5% less elemental damage.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Meditate
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Attempt to obtain some useful information from it.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_Meat
Text.Desc: Blood and flesh from Torch Dragon's body, it is tainted by the power of Yin and Yang and thus has unique uses. Consuming it decreases Attainment by 2 and extends Lifespan by 10 years. Multiple consumptions will gradually diminish its effect.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_FengYin
Text.Desc: An ancient piece of jade from the treasures of the dragon's platform, it seems to be one of a set of items.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Inspect

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_FengYin
Text.Desc: A peculiar piece of jade found on the Heavenly Battlefield, the ancient battlefield. The essence of Yin and Yang flickers within it, as if nurturing something.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Inspect
